title: Priority Areas (ParkServe)
description: "To help planners prioritize where to address park access gaps first, TPL provides a prioritization index for all populated areas that are not within a 10-minute walk to a park. The prioritization index is calculated for census block groups and is based on a comprehensive index of six equally weighted demographic and environmental metrics. The six variables are: 1. Population density 2. Density of low-income households... 3. Density of people of color 4. Community health... 5. Urban heat islands... 6. Pollution burden"
display_note: Info: ParkServe is partially crowdsourced and regularly updated. Only the most recent update is available for download at any given time, and data should be understood as incomplete.
creator: Trust for Public Land
provider: Healthy Regions & Policies Lab, University of Illinois, Urbana-Champaign
